overview: A young reporter loses his girlfriend and job in one day. Then one evening while drinking with his longtime buddies at a bar, he comes across a cash-filled briefcase belonging to a mysterious underworld lord. Greed and conflict over the possession of the money begins to erode their friendship. Depressed and in a vulnerable position, Ryan agrees to join the underworld lord's organization. Unknown to him, the organization is actually a cult that sacrifices humans in exchange for wealth and beauty.
tagline: They are here to get you back...
title: Battle of the Souls
